[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”section” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row admin_label=”row” _builder_version=”4.25.0″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Text” _builder_version=”4.27.4″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” global_colors_info=”{}”]

iAt Birth Tissue Recovery we offer a great salary with exceptional benefits to those committed to our mission. Teamwork is at the center of everything we do, and we push to ensure our team members have the training they need to succeed in our fast-paced environment. Detail-oriented, adaptive, collaborative, and empathetic individuals tend to succeed at BTR.

With nine offices in four states, we offer a variety of job opportunities for ambitious, hardworking, ethical, and methodical individuals. Our open roles are listed in the links below. Please click through to the listing for the job description and to apply to any that interest you.

Current Openings

 

  • None at this time.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”mailto:btr.hr@birthtissuerecovery.com” url_new_window=”on” button_text=”Email HR” button_alignment=”center” admin_label=”Email HR” _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

meta._et_pb_old_content:
At Birth Tissue Recovery we offer a great salary with exceptional benefits to those committed to our mission. Teamwork is at the center of everything we do, and we push to ensure our team members have the training they need to succeed in our fast-paced environment. Detail-oriented, adaptive, collaborative, and empathetic individuals tend to succeed at BTR. With eight offices in three states, we offer a variety of job opportunities for ambitious, hardworking, ethical, and methodical individuals. Our open roles are listed in the links below. Please click through to the listing for the job description and to apply to any that interest you.

Full-time Weekend Coordinator Support Associate – Raleigh

Full-time Weekend Coordinator Support Associate - Greensboro

Full-time Weekend Coordinator Support Associate - Grand Rapids, Mich

FULL-TIME WEEKEND Coordinator Support Associate – Hickory, N.C.

Email HR
